transcript:
hey if you ever feel stress or anxiety
about the future I'm going to share a
secet with you real quick that's going
to help you out one of the amazing
things about being a human is we have
such Rich imaginations we can imagine a
future that doesn't even exist that's a
beautiful thing but the problem with
that is that our imaginations are so
rich we can actually draw energy from
the future that we're imagining so if
you have stress and anxiety or fear you
have to ask yourself what future are you
imagining that you are actually drawing
Stress and Anxiety in fear from so what
do we do we stop thinking about what we
don't want and we start thinking about
what we do want if we can imagine a
future why not imagine a future that's
amazing that's inspiring that's
motivating and draw energy from that and
feel that in this moment so what you
want to do realizing that our
imagination is so rich is stop thinking
about what you don't want and start
thinking about what you do want and then
pull energy from that imaginary future
